definitions.definition: A bundle of sticks or brushwood intended to be used for fuel tied together for carrying. ( Some sources specify that a faggot is tied with two bands or withes , whereas a bavin is tied with just one. )
A bundle of pieces of iron or steel cut off into suitable lengths for welding .
A burning or smouldering piece of firewood .
A meatball made with offcuts and offal , especially pork . (See Wikipedia .)
A homosexual man, especially an effeminate one.
A man considered weak , effeminate , timid , pathetic , emotional , non- heteronormative in some way.
definitions.label_groups: chiefly US , Canada , derogatory , offensive , vulgar
UK , Ireland , dated , colloquial , derogatory , now offensive

definitions.definition: A soldier numbered on the muster roll , but not really existing.

definitions.label_groups: UK , Ireland , historical , possibly now offensive
UK , Ireland , dated , slang , now offensive

main_definition: ( chiefly UK , Ireland , collective ) A bundle of sticks or brushwood intended to be used for fuel tied together for carrying. ( Some sources specify that a faggot is tied with two bands or withes , whereas a bavin is tied with just one. )
secondary_definitions: A bundle of pieces of iron or steel cut off into suitable lengths for welding .
( rare , dated in US ) A burning or smouldering piece of firewood .
( chiefly UK , Ireland ) A meatball made with offcuts and offal , especially pork . (See Wikipedia .)
( highly derogatory , offensive , vulgar ) A homosexual man, especially an effeminate one.
( loosely , highly derogatory , offensive , vulgar ) A non-heterosexual man.
( chiefly US , Canada , derogatory , offensive , vulgar ) A man considered weak , effeminate , timid , pathetic , emotional , non- heteronormative in some way.
( US , Canada , derogatory , offensive , vulgar ) An annoying or inconsiderate person.
( UK , Ireland , dated , colloquial , derogatory , now offensive ) A shrewish woman.
( obsolete , possibly now offensive ) A soldier numbered on the muster roll , but not really existing.
( UK , Ireland , historical , possibly now offensive ) A faggot voter .
( UK , Ireland , dated , slang , now offensive ) A lazy, weak, work-shy person.
